<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
RETAIL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/14/government-turns-drugstore-chains-administer-vaccines?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Retailers Patch Up Holes in Vaccine Distribution
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="dule hill in holes" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=357 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/PrEUkNFD9pN2o/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="dule hill in holes" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/PrEUkNFD9pN2o/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Things Walgreens can cure: nasty hangovers, the fungus growing on your pinky toe, and just <em>maybe</em>...slow vaccine rollouts.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Last Thursday, the federal government began <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/02/biden-administration-will-start-sending-covid-vaccines-directly-to-pharmacies-as-it-ups-shipments.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">shipping</a> 1 million Covid-19 vaccines to retail chains across the country, including Walmart, CVS, Walgreens, and Kroger, as part of the Federal Retail Pharmacy Program.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>6,500 pharmacies will get the doses to start, but the goal is to eventually hit 40,000 locations. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Why it makes sense</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Retail pharmacies are already experts at filling prescriptions and administering flu shots, which means they can pivot to Covid vaccines without too much trouble. And given their sprawling, nationwide footprints, drugstore chains are already some of the most accessible healthcare providers for many Americans. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>CVS and Walgreens have 19,000 stores combined in the US. Publix + Kroger + Rite Aid have 11,000, </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/covid-19-vaccines-to-stress-test-grocery-stores-and-pharmacies-11612175400?mod=article_inline&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">per the WSJ</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But the real power player in vaccine distribution is—no surprise here—<a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/walmarts-covid-19-vaccine-rollout-heads-to-small-towns-11613298604?mod=hp_lead_pos1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Walmart</a>, which will receive 20% of all doses sent to pharmacies by the government. That’s in part because the majority of its stores are located in areas with limited healthcare resources, which the government is trying to target under this pharmacy program. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">Could this be a biz opportunity? </strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Despite everyone worrying about germs for the past year, the pandemic actually didn’t help drugstore chains the way it did bad Netflix shows. People came to stores less frequently, and when they did come, it was for consumer goods products that aren’t as profitable as services like photo printing.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">CVS, Rite Aid, and Walgreens hope that administering vaccines will lead to higher foot traffic and sales, because why not chug a 5-Hour Energy after you get your Covid shot to keep the good vibes rolling?</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>All three of those companies are either </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/10/drugstore-disruption-cvs-walgreens-and-rite-aid-have-a-new-playbook.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">transforming</a></span><span> their businesses or restructuring to stiff-arm increased competition from the likes of Amazon. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The US has administered <a href="https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2021/01/28/960901166/how-is-the-covid-19-vaccination-campaign-going-in-your-state?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">more than 50 million doses</a> to more than 11% of the country’s population. We’re averaging more than 1.6 million shots/day. </p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
QUOTES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/15/top-quotes-weekend?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Weekend Soundbites
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="WILMINGTON, DE  December 8, 2020:President- elect Joe Biden introduces..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MDYxL3ByZXNpZGVudC1lbGVjdF9qb2VfYmlkZW4uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>The Washington Post/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It’s a complete coincidence, but all these quotes happen to start with “we.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">“We will take action to end our epidemic of gun violence and make our schools and communities safer.”</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">President Biden pledged to enact <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/14/biden-calls-on-congress-to-reform-gun-laws-on-anniversary-of-parkland-shooting.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stricter gun laws</a> on the third anniversary of the mass shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, FL, that killed 17. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">“We still have 100,000 cases a day. We still have somewhere between 1,500 and 3,500 deaths per day. And yet we see some communities relaxing some of their mitigation strategies. We are nowhere out of the woods.”</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">CDC Director Rochelle Walensky said on <em>Face the Nation</em> that it’s <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/14/covid-cdc-director-says-lifting-mask-requirements-is-a-mistake.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">too early</a> to remove mask mandates, like states such as Iowa and Montana have done. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">“We are not afraid.”</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Volkswagen CEO Herbert Diess told a German newspaper that he’s <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-volkswagen-apple/volkswagen-ceo-diess-not-afraid-of-an-apple-electric-car-idUSKBN2AE0GN?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">not worried</a> about competition from Apple, which is reportedly working on releasing an electric car by 2024.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">“We live in a society where honor is a distant memory.”</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Jared Leto’s Joker alludes to the popular meme in the <a href="https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/movies/2021/02/14/justice-league-trailer-see-jared-leto-joker-zack-snyder-cut/4483287001/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">first full-length trailer</a> for Zack Snyder’s <em>Justice League</em>. The four-hour supercut is arriving on HBO Max and in theaters on March 18. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
DATING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/15/dating-apps-stay-popular-pandemic-drags?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Horizontal Swiping > Vertical Swiping
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When TikTok’s “For You” page ran dry, many homebound singles switched to dating apps to work their thumb muscles in a different direction. Downloads of the eight most popular dating apps <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/tinder-bumble-and-hinge-show-surge-in-americans-looking-for-love-online-11613246400?mod=pls_whats_news_us_business_f&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">increased 7.4%</a> annually in Q4, and time spent using them rose 13.4%, according to the WSJ.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Downloads and time spent on dating apps <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/18/dating-apps-see-increased-engagement-struggle-convert-dollars?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">have been rising</a> since the pandemic hit in the spring of 2020. But the same conditions that juiced usage statistics also led to monetization challenges—users were less likely to splurge on premium features if the prospect of an in-person date remained slim. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>But dating execs are optimistic for the post-pandemic future. “As lockdowns ease and mobility increases, people do turn to our apps,” Match Group CEO Sharmistha Dubey told the WSJ. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Bumble stock </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/11/bumble-ipo-bmbl-starts-trading-on-nasdaq.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">popped 63%</a></span><span> in its trading debut last week.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line:</strong> If you’re looking for a pickup line that’s about 96% effective, talk about vaccination. Between September and December of last year, Tinder reported a <a href="https://nypost.com/2021/02/14/dating-apps-sees-surge-of-users-boasting-about-being-vaccinated/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">258% increase</a> in vaccine mentions. </p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPONSORED BY BOMBAS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">

<font color="#000000">
Not Solely About Socks
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://bombas.com/pages/6-reasons-to-shop-bombas?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=scontent&utm_campaign=cf_acq-bt_core-cp_mixed-ca_core&utm_term=multi-lifestyle" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Bombas" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL3BsYWNlbWVudC9pbWFnZXMvMTk2OS8xNjEzMDY0OTg0LUxpZmVzdHlsZV9Nb3JuaW5nQnJld18yMTUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0IjoiY29tZXQtbW9ybmluZ2JyZXciLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Your favorite sock peeps are on a <strong style="color:#000">comfort mission </strong>bigger than just feet. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Bombas doesn’t <em>only</em> make those <a href="https://bombas.com/pages/6-reasons-to-shop-bombas?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=scontent&utm_campaign=cf_acq-bt_core-cp_mixed-ca_core&utm_term=multi-lifestyle" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">super soft socks</a> with extra arch support, stay-up tech, and seam-free freedom for your feet. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">They’ve taken their prowess in a new, slightly-upward direction—releasing a new line of underwear <strong style="color:#000">so comfortable you might forget you’re wearing ‘em</strong>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But what feels better than their <a href="https://bombas.com/pages/6-reasons-to-shop-bombas?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=scontent&utm_campaign=cf_acq-bt_core-cp_mixed-ca_core&utm_term=multi-lifestyle" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">soft, cool-to-the-touch cotton</a> is that every sock or undie you buy will be matched 1:1 and donated to the homeless community—designed specifically with their needs in mind. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">That means with each Bombas purchase, you get to <a href="https://bombas.com/pages/6-reasons-to-shop-bombas?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=scontent&utm_campaign=cf_acq-bt_core-cp_mixed-ca_core&utm_term=multi-lifestyle" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">make your soles, your nether regions, <em>and</em> the world a better place</a>. Now that gets a soul-a-singing. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://bombas.com/pages/6-reasons-to-shop-bombas?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=scontent&utm_campaign=cf_acq-bt_core-cp_mixed-ca_core&utm_term=multi-lifestyle" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Use the code BREW for 20% off your first order</a>.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/15/drone-age-upon-us?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Welcome to the Drone Age
</font></a>
</h1>

</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Drone pickup up box" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MDU5L2Ryb25lc19ndWlkZS5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Back in 2012, the FAA anticipated 30,000 drones operating by 2020. But, like the current temperature in Texas, that was wayyyyy too low. According to data from the government, there are at least 1,746,248 registered drones in the US, and likely many more unregistered ones.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What are they being used for? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">That’s a question we don’t have enough space to answer in this newsletter. Luckily, Emerging Tech Brew created an <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/s/drone-guide?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">in-depth guide</a> outlining what the proliferation of drones means for farmers, emergency responders, the military, and a bunch of other industries and professions. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">One potential use case: </strong></span><span>Boston-based LEK Consulting predicts that drones could account for </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-02-14/drones-seen-capturing-30-of-express-delivery-market-by-2040?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">30% of same-day package deliveries</a></span><span> by 2040. That sound you hear is Amazon's drool hitting the floor. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>The drone age is upon us, according to Emerging Tech Brew writer Ryan Duffy. “Commercial drones will eventually be integrated into our everyday lives.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/s/drone-guide?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Read the drone guide here</a>.  </p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CALENDAR
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/14/week-ahead-gamestop-hearing-housing-numbers-mardis-gras?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Week Ahead: GameStop Hearing, Housing Numbers, and Mardis Gras
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<img alt="Mardis Gras" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MDYyL21hcmRpc19ncmFzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Chris Graythen/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">GameStop hearing: </strong>Tickets for this one might be tougher to get than Phish’s NYE shows at Madison Square Garden. This Thursday, the House will <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-02-13/citadel-s-griffin-robinhood-ceo-to-testify-on-gamestop-feb-18?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">hold a hearing</a> on GameStop’s wild stock fluctuations, and here’s just part of the guest list: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev, Keith Gill (aka “Roaring Kitty” on YouTube), Citadel founder Ken Griffin, and Melvin Capital Management CEO Gabe Plotkin. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Earnings: </strong>The season to report Q4 financials is winding down, but Walmart is up on Thursday and a few hospitality names (Hilton, Marriott) will also reveal the pandemic’s effects on their business. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Economy: </strong>We’ll get a pulse check on the booming residential real estate industry with housing data for January. Monthly retail sales numbers also drop on Wednesday.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Everything else: </strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>A </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/14/technology/north-dakota-tech-apps.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">North Dakota vote</a></span><span> on regulating Big Tech. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Tuesday is Mardis Gras (or this year, “</span><span><a href="https://nola.eater.com/2021/2/10/22275068/mardi-gras-2021-new-orleans-restaurants-bars-house-floats-king-cakes?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Yardi Gras</a></span><span>”). The next day is Ash Wednesday.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>On Thursday, NASA’s Perseverance rover will try to land on Mars.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Speaking of Mars...about a week after the United Arab Emirates spacecraft “Hope” entered a stable orbit around the planet, we have the first image from the mission to survey Elon’s intergalactic BFF. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">  <img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MDYwL21hcnMuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIn0=" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""></p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
BREW'S BETS
</h3>
</td>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Contest reminder</strong>: Our Friday Puzzle lasts the entire week, and we’re giving a shout out to the winner this Friday. <a href="https://twitter.com/MorningBrew/status/1360226134449913862?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Check out the puzzle</a> and enter to win. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Distance to Mars:</strong> With the Red Planet in the news, experience <a href="http://www.distancetomars.com/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">just how far away it is</a> from us.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Dive back into the week: </strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Shallow dive: </strong></span><span>Wikipedia </span><span><a href="https://www.instagram.com/depthsofwikipedia/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">is weird</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Medium dive: </strong></span><span><a href="https://www.vox.com/recode/21727016/2020-in-charts-covid-vaccine-pandemic-election?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">20 charts</a></span><span> that explain 2020.</span>
</li>

style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nRetailers Patch Up Holes in Vaccine Distribution\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if mso]\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"dule hill in holes\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" height=357 src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/PrEUkNFD9pN2o/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso]\u003e--\u003e\u003c!-- --\u003e\n\u003cimg class=\"story-header-image\" alt=\"dule hill in holes\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/PrEUkNFD9pN2o/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c!--\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThings Walgreens can cure: nasty hangovers, the fungus growing on your pinky toe, and just \u003cem\u003emaybe\u003c/em\u003e...slow vaccine rollouts.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eLast Thursday, the federal government began \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/02/biden-administration-will-start-sending-covid-vaccines-directly-to-pharmacies-as-it-ups-shipments.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eshipping\u003c/a\u003e 1 million Covid-19 vaccines to retail chains across the country, including Walmart, CVS, Walgreens, and Kroger, as part of the Federal Retail Pharmacy Program.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e6,500 pharmacies will get the doses to start, but the goal is to eventually hit 40,000 locations. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhy it makes sense\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRetail pharmacies are already experts at filling prescriptions and administering flu shots, which means they can pivot to Covid vaccines without too much trouble. And given their sprawling, nationwide footprints, drugstore chains are already some of the most accessible healthcare providers for many Americans. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eCVS and Walgreens have 19,000 stores combined in the US. Publix + Kroger + Rite Aid have 11,000, \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/covid-19-vaccines-to-stress-test-grocery-stores-and-pharmacies-11612175400?mod=article_inline\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eper the WSJ\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut the real power player in vaccine distribution is—no surprise here—\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/walmarts-covid-19-vaccine-rollout-heads-to-small-towns-11613298604?mod=hp_lead_pos1\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eWalmart\u003c/a\u003e, which will receive 20% of all doses sent to pharmacies by the government. That’s in part because the majority of its stores are located in areas with limited healthcare resources, which the government is trying to target under this pharmacy program. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCould this be a biz opportunity? \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eDespite everyone worrying about germs for the past year, the pandemic actually didn’t help drugstore chains the way it did bad Netflix shows. People came to stores less frequently, and when they did come, it was for consumer goods products that aren’t as profitable as services like photo printing.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCVS, Rite Aid, and Walgreens hope that administering vaccines will lead to higher foot traffic and sales, because why not chug a 5-Hour Energy after you get your Covid shot to keep the good vibes rolling?\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eAll three of those companies are either \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/10/drugstore-disruption-cvs-walgreens-and-rite-aid-have-a-new-playbook.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etransforming\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e their businesses or restructuring to stiff-arm increased competition from the likes of Amazon. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe US has administered \u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2021/01/28/960901166/how-is-the-covid-19-vaccination-campaign-going-in-your-state?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emore than 50 million doses\u003c/a\u003e to more than 11% of the country’s population. We’re averaging more than 1.6 million shots/day. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt’s a complete coincidence, but all these quotes happen to start with “we.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e“We will take action to end our epidemic of gun violence and make our schools and communities safer.”\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePresident Biden pledged to enact \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/14/biden-calls-on-congress-to-reform-gun-laws-on-anniversary-of-parkland-shooting.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estricter gun laws\u003c/a\u003e on the third anniversary of the mass shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, FL, that killed 17. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e“We still have 100,000 cases a day. We still have somewhere between 1,500 and 3,500 deaths per day. And yet we see some communities relaxing some of their mitigation strategies. We are nowhere out of the woods.”\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCDC Director Rochelle Walensky said on \u003cem\u003eFace the Nation\u003c/em\u003e that it’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/14/covid-cdc-director-says-lifting-mask-requirements-is-a-mistake.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etoo early\u003c/a\u003e to remove mask mandates, like states such as Iowa and Montana have done. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e“We are not afraid.”\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eVolkswagen CEO Herbert Diess told a German newspaper that he’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-volkswagen-apple/volkswagen-ceo-diess-not-afraid-of-an-apple-electric-car-idUSKBN2AE0GN?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enot worried\u003c/a\u003e about competition from Apple, which is reportedly working on releasing an electric car by 2024.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e“We live in a society where honor is a distant style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhen TikTok’s “For You” page ran dry, many homebound singles switched to dating apps to work their thumb muscles in a different direction. Downloads of the eight most popular dating apps \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/tinder-bumble-and-hinge-show-surge-in-americans-looking-for-love-online-11613246400?mod=pls_whats_news_us_business_f\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eincreased 7.4%\u003c/a\u003e annually in Q4, and time spent using them rose 13.4%, according to the WSJ.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eDownloads and time spent on dating apps \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/12/18/dating-apps-see-increased-engagement-struggle-convert-dollars?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehave been rising\u003c/a\u003e since the pandemic hit in the spring of 2020. But the same conditions that juiced usage statistics also led to monetization challenges—users were less likely to splurge on premium features if the prospect of an in-person date remained slim. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBut dating execs are optimistic for the post-pandemic future. “As lockdowns ease and mobility increases, people do turn to our apps,” Match Group CEO Sharmistha Dubey told the WSJ. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eBumble stock \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/02/11/bumble-ipo-bmbl-starts-trading-on-nasdaq.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epopped 63%\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in its trading debut last week.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line:\u003c/strong\u003e If you’re looking for a pickup line that’s about 96% effective, talk about vaccination. collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBack in 2012, the FAA anticipated 30,000 drones operating by 2020. But, like the current temperature in Texas, that was wayyyyy too low. According to data from the government, there are at least 1,746,248 registered drones in the US, and likely many more unregistered ones.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat are they being used for? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThat’s a question we don’t have enough space to answer in this newsletter. Luckily, Emerging Tech Brew created an \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/s/drone-guide?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ein-depth guide\u003c/a\u003e outlining what the proliferation of drones means for farmers, emergency responders, the military, and a bunch of other industries and professions. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne potential use case: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBoston-based LEK Consulting predicts that drones could account for \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-02-14/drones-seen-capturing-30-of-express-delivery-market-by-2040?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e30% of same-day package deliveries\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e by 2040. That sound you hear is Amazon's drool hitting the floor. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong hearing: \u003c/strong\u003eTickets for this one might be tougher to get than Phish’s NYE shows at Madison Square Garden. This Thursday, the House will \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-02-13/citadel-s-griffin-robinhood-ceo-to-testify-on-gamestop-feb-18?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehold a hearing\u003c/a\u003e on GameStop’s wild stock fluctuations, and here’s just part of the guest list: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev, Keith Gill (aka “Roaring Kitty” on YouTube), Citadel founder Ken Griffin, and Melvin Capital Management CEO Gabe Plotkin. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eEarnings: \u003c/strong\u003eThe season to report Q4 financials is winding down, but Walmart is up on Thursday and a few hospitality names (Hilton, Marriott) will also reveal the pandemic’s effects on their business. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eEconomy: \u003c/strong\u003eWe’ll get a pulse check on the booming residential real estate industry with housing data for January.
